articles.title: Fall Update 2025 | Halo Infinite | Halo - Official Site (en) - Halo Waypoint
articles.description: Halo Infinite’s Fall Update introduces a new vehicle, a new weapon, two limited-time playlists, exciting sandbox additions, Forge features, and a Premium Operation Pass loaded with four full armor sets!

articles.title: iOS 26: 10+ Features Coming to the Phone App - MacRumors
articles.description: The Phone app doesn't often get a lot of attention with iOS updates, but that's changing in iOS 26. There are multiple new features to...

articles.title: Anthropic Revokes OpenAI's Access to Claude - WIRED
articles.description: OpenAI lost access to the Claude API this week after Anthropic claimed the company was violating its terms of service.

articles.title: EA Shutting Down Four Games Forever in October - ComicBook.com
articles.description: EA, aka Electronic Arts, is set to shut down four different games in October across PC, Xbox, PlayStation, and Nintendo devices.

articles.title: Darksiders 4, New SpongeBob Game, And More Revealed During THQ Showcase - GameSpot
articles.description: If you've been playing video games for over 20 years, THQ Nordic might have something for you.
